org.easybatch.core.api.event.step

Interface RecordValidatorEventListener


  • public interface RecordValidatorEventListener
    Event interface collection for RecordValidator events.

    You should implement this interface in your validator to declare the ability to receive events from the batch process.

    Author:
    Mario Mueller (mario@xenji.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterRecordValidation(java.lang.Object validatedRecord, java.util.Set<ValidationError> validationErrors)
      Called after each validation.
      java.lang.Object beforeRecordValidation(java.lang.Object mappedRecord)
      Called before each validation.

    • Method Detail

      • afterRecordValidation

        void afterRecordValidation(java.lang.Object validatedRecord,
                         java.util.Set<ValidationError> validationErrors)
        Called after each validation.
        Parameters:
        validatedRecord - The validated record.
        validationErrors - The Set of validation errors, if any.

      • beforeRecordValidation

        java.lang.Object beforeRecordValidation(java.lang.Object mappedRecord)
        Called before each validation. If you create a new record, you must keep the original header of the modified record.
        Parameters:
        mappedRecord - The mapped record that is going to be validated.
